description:
What is it: The default Windows Hello for Business configuration applied with the lowest priority to all users regardless of group membership. 
 Simeon Notes: Simeon's baseline disables Hello For Business including the option to set a PIN on enrollment. Simeon's experience has found that the majority of business do not want this option turned on. 
 Learn More: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/mem/intune/protect/identity-protection-windows-settings
